trans-unit.target: 在容器元素中添加 white-space: nowrap ：

trans-unit.source: Add comments between elements to NOT have a white space. For me it is easier than resetting font size to zero and then setting it back.
trans-unit.target: 在元素之间添加注释 ，不能有空格。 对我来说，这比将字体大小重置为零然后再设置回零容易。

trans-unit.source: All the space elimination techniques for display:inline-block are nasty hacks...

trans-unit.source: How do I remove the space between inline-block elements
trans-unit.target: 如何删除内联块元素之间的空格?

trans-unit.source: How to remove the space between inline-block elements? I was hoping for a CSS solution that doesn't require the HTML source code to be tampered with. Can this issue be solved with CSS alone?
trans-unit.target: 如何删除内联块元素之间的空间？ 我希望找到一种不需要篡改HTML源代码的CSS解决方案。 可以仅使用CSS来解决此问题吗？

trans-unit.source: However, I have to warn you
trans-unit.target: 不过,我必须警告你

trans-unit.source: However, I was hoping for a CSS solution that doesn't require the HTML source code to be tampered with.
trans-unit.target: 但是,我希望有一个不需要篡改HTML源码的CSS解决方案。

trans-unit.source: However, it won't be okay with word-spacing and margin-left when we set bigger value like -1em.
trans-unit.target: 但是，当我们设置更大的值（如 -1em )时，用 word-spacing 和 margin-left 将不可行 。

trans-unit.source: However, while this is a reasonable solution if you specifically need a CSS only fix, it's not what I recommend if you're free to change your HTML (as most of us are).
trans-unit.target: 但是，虽然这是一个合理的解决方案（如果您特别需要仅CSS的修复程序），但是如果您可以自由更改HTML（与我们大多数人一样），那么我不建议您这样做。

trans-unit.source: I found a pure CSS solution that worked for me very well in all browsers:
trans-unit.target: 我找到了一个纯CSS的解决方案,在所有的浏览器中都能很好的解决我的问题。

trans-unit.source: I had this problem right now and from font-size:0; I've found that in Internet Explorer 7 the problem remains because Internet Explorer thinks "Font Size 0?!?! WTF are you crazy man?" - So, in my case I've Eric Meyer's CSS reset and with font-size:0.01em; I have a difference of 1 pixel from Internet Explorer 7 to Firefox 9, so, I think this can be a solution.
trans-unit.target: 我现在从 font-size:0; 遇到这个问题； 我发现在Internet Explorer 7中问题仍然存在，因为Internet Explorer认为“字体大小0？！？！WTF您是疯子吗？”。 -因此，就我而言，我已经重置了Eric Meyer的CSS，并且使用 font-size:0.01em; 从Internet Explorer 7到Firefox 9，我的像素相差1个像素，因此，我认为这可以解决。

trans-unit.source: I know how to solve this with JavaScript - by removing the text nodes from the container element (the paragraph), like so:
trans-unit.target: 我知道如何用JavaScript来解决这个问题----从容器元素(段落)中删除文本节点,就像这样。

trans-unit.source: I think the following couple lines is a lot better and more re-usable, and time saver than any other methods. I personally use this:
trans-unit.target: 我觉得下面这两句话,比起其他的方法来说,我觉得更有效果,可重复使用,也更节省时间。我个人用的是这个。

trans-unit.source: I think there is a very simple/old method for this which is supported by all browsers even IE 6/7. We could simply set letter-spacing to a large negative value in parent and then set it back to normal at child elements:
trans-unit.target: 我认为有一个非常简单/旧的方法，所有浏览器甚至IE 6/7都支持。 我们可以简单地在父级中将 letter-spacing 设置为较大的负值，然后在子元素中将其设置回 normal ：

trans-unit.source: I thought I'd add something new to this question as although many of the answers currently provided are more than adequate & relevant, there are some new CSS properties which can achieve a very clean output, with full support across all browsers, and little to no 'hacks'. This does move away from inline-block but it gives you the same results as the question asked for.
trans-unit.target: 我以为我会在这个问题上添加一些新内容，尽管当前提供的许多答案绰绰有余，而且有一些新的CSS属性可以实现非常干净的输出，并在所有浏览器中均提供全面支持，并且几乎没有没有“骇客”。 这确实摆脱了 inline-block 但它为您提供了与所要求的问题相同的结果。

trans-unit.source: I understand why this happens, and I also know that I could get rid of that space by removing the white-space between the SPAN elements in the HTML source code, like so:
trans-unit.target: 我明白为什么会出现这种情况,我也知道我可以通过删除HTML源代码中的SPAN元素之间的留白来去掉那个空格,就像这样。

trans-unit.source: I’ve been tackling this recently and instead of setting the parent font-size:0 then setting the child back to a reasonable value, I’ve been getting consistent results by setting the parent container letter-spacing:-.25em then the child back to letter-spacing:normal.
trans-unit.target: 我最近一直在解决这个问题，而不是先设置父 font-size:0 然后将子级设置回合理的值，而是通过设置父容器 letter-spacing:-.25em 然后是子级，获得了一致的结果返回 letter-spacing:normal 。

trans-unit.source: I'm going to expand on user5609829's answer a little bit as I believe the other solutions here are too complicated/too much work. Applying a margin-right: -4px to the inline block elements will remove the spacing and is supported by all browsers. See the updated fiddle here. For those concerned with using negative margins, try giving this a read.
trans-unit.target: 我将进一步扩展user5609829的答案，因为我认为这里的其他解决方案太复杂/工作量太大。 margin-right: -4px 内元素上应用margin-right：-4px会删除间距，并且受所有浏览器支持。 在这里查看更新的小提琴。 对于那些关心使用负边距的人，请尝试阅读一下。

trans-unit.target: 我不太清楚,如果你想做两个蓝色的跨度没有空隙,还是想处理其他的留白,如果你想去掉空隙的话。

trans-unit.source: In an alternate thread I saw a commenter mention that font-size:0 isn’t always ideal because people can control minimum font sizes in their browsers, completely negating the possibility of setting the font-size to zero.
trans-unit.target: 在另一个帖子中，我看到一个评论者提到 font-size:0 并不总是理想的，因为人们可以在浏览器中控制最小字体大小，从而完全消除了将font-size设置为零的可能性。

trans-unit.source: In the meantime, give the parent element font-size: 0; and set the font-size on the children. This should do the trick
trans-unit.target: 同时，给父元素 font-size: 0; 并在子 font-size 上设置字体大小 。 这应该可以解决问题

trans-unit.source: In theory, it should do exactly what is needed — shorten whitespaces between 'words' by the 100% of the space character width, i.e. to zero. But seems not to work anywhere, unfortunately, and this feature is marked 'at risk' (it can be dropped from the specification, too).
trans-unit.target: 从理论上讲，它应该完全满足需要-将“单词”之间的空格缩短100％的空格字符宽度，即为零。 但不幸的是，它似乎无法在任何地方使用，并且此功能被标记为“有风险”（也可以从规范中删除）。

trans-unit.source: It is possible to solve this problem with CSS alone, but there are no completely robust CSS fixes.
trans-unit.target: 可以单独使用CSS来解决此问题，但是尚没有完全可靠的CSS修复程序。

trans-unit.source: It is absolutely not thinkable to inline all that stuff, it would mean
trans-unit.target: 绝对不可能把这些东西都列在里面,这意味着

trans-unit.source: It seems that this is the reason.
trans-unit.target: 看来是这个原因。

trans-unit.source: It shortens the inter-word spaces by the width of the digit '0'. In a monospace font it should be exactly equal to the width of the space character (and any other character as well). This works in Firefox 10+, Chrome 27+, and almost works in Internet Explorer 9+.
trans-unit.target: 它通过数字“ 0”的宽度缩短了字间距。 在等宽字体中，它应完全等于空格字符（以及其他任何字符）的宽度。 它可以在Firefox 10 +，Chrome 27+和IE 9+中运行。

trans-unit.source: It's awesome, solves all this inline-block layout bs, and as of 2017 has 98% browser support (more if you don't care about old IEs).
trans-unit.target: 很棒，解决了所有这些内联块布局bs，并且到2017年为止， 浏览器支持率达到98％ （如果您不关心旧的IE，则更多）。

trans-unit.source: It's easy. It's simple. It works everywhere. It's the pragmatic solution.
trans-unit.target: 这很简单。它很简单。它的作用是无处不在。它是实用的解决方案。

trans-unit.source: Specifies extra inter-character space in addition to the default space between characters. Values may be negative, but there may be implementation-specific limits. User agents may not further increase or decrease the inter-character space in order to justify text.

trans-unit.source: Suit to taste. Here’s a download to the font I just cooked up in font-forge and converted with FontSquirrel webfont generator. Took me all of 5 minutes. The css @font-face declaration is included: zipped zero-width space font. It's in Google Drive so you'll need to click File > Download to save it to your computer. You'll probably need to change the font paths as well if you copy the declaration to your main css file.

trans-unit.source: The CSS Text Module Level 4 specification defines a text-space-collapse property, which allow to control the how white space inside and around an element is processed.

trans-unit.source: There are lots of solutions like font-size:0,word-spacing,margin-left,letter-spacing and so on.
trans-unit.target: 有很多解决方案，例如 font-size:0 ， word-spacing ， margin-left ， letter-spacing 等。

trans-unit.source: There is no need to touch the parent element.
trans-unit.target: 没有必要触及父元素。

trans-unit.source: There’s actually a really simple way to remove whitespace from inline-block that’s both easy and semantic. It’s called a custom font with zero-width spaces, which allows you to collapse the whitespace (added by the browser for inline elements when they're on separate lines) at the font level using a very tiny font. Once you declare the font, you just change the font-family on the container and back again on the children, and voila. Like this:
trans-unit.target: 实际上，有一种非常简单的方法可以从内联块中删除空白，这既简单又语义。 它被称为带有零宽度空格的自定义字体，它允许您使用非常小的字体在字体级别折叠空白（当行内元素位于单独的行时由浏览器添加的空白）。 声明字体后，只需在容器上更改 font-family ，然后再在子级上更改字体 ，瞧。 像这样：

trans-unit.source: This is the same answer I gave over on the related: Display: Inline block - What is that space?
trans-unit.target: 这是我在相关内容上给出的相同答案： 显示：内联块-那是什么空间？

trans-unit.source: This is what I, as a reasonably experienced web developer, actually do to solve this problem:
trans-unit.target: 这就是我作为一个相当有经验的web开发者,实际是如何解决这个问题的。

trans-unit.source: This way you will have a readable and correctly indented code.
trans-unit.target: 这样,你将拥有一个可读的、正确的缩进式代码。

trans-unit.source: This works (maybe -3px may be better) exactly as you would anticipate it to work.
trans-unit.target: 这样做的效果(也许-3px可能更好)与你预期的效果完全一样。

trans-unit.source: This works in recent versions of all modern browsers. It works in IE8. It does not work in Safari 5, but it does work in Safari 6. Safari 5 is nearly a dead browser (0.33%, August 2015).
trans-unit.target: 这在所有现代浏览器的最新版本中均有效。 它可以在IE8中使用。 它不能在Safari 5中运行，但可以在Safari 6中运行。Safari 5几乎是无效的浏览器（ 2015年8月为0.33％ ）。

trans-unit.source: Though, technically not an answer to the question: "How do I remove the space between inline-block elements?"
trans-unit.target: 虽然,从技术上讲,并没有回答这个问题。"如何删除内嵌式单元格之间的空格?"

trans-unit.target: 基于CSS文本模块3级的另外两个选项（而不是从规范草案中删除的 white-space-collapsing:discard ）：

trans-unit.source: Unfortunately, it is 2019 and white-space-collapse is still not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 不幸的是，现在是2019年， white-space-collapse 仍然没有实现。

trans-unit.source: Unfortunately, no browser is implementing this property yet (as of September 2016) as mentioned in the comments to the answer of HBP.
trans-unit.target: 不幸的是，如HBP答案的注释中所述，尚无浏览器实现此属性（截至2016年9月）。

trans-unit.target: Update

trans-unit.source: Use flexbox and do a fallback (from suggestions above) for older browsers:
trans-unit.target: 使用flexbox并做一个回退(从上面的建议),对于老的浏览器。

trans-unit.source: Using font-size is not convenient when we try to using em as font-size unit.
trans-unit.target: 当我们尝试使用 em 作为 font-size 单位时，使用 font-size 并不方便。

trans-unit.source: Using CSS flexible boxes - Web developer guide | MDN
trans-unit.target: MDN

trans-unit.source: Using ems appears to work regardless of whether the font-size specified is 100%, 15pt or 36px.
trans-unit.target: 无论指定的字体大小是100%、15pt还是36px,使用ems似乎都可以。

trans-unit.source: W3Schools - word-spacing property
trans-unit.target: W3Schools-字间距属性

trans-unit.source: When creating a grid you can specify the gaps between the rows and columns. The default gap is already set to 0px but you can change this value to whatever you like.
trans-unit.target: 创建 grid ，可以指定行和列之间的间隙。 默认间隙已经设置为 0px ,但是您可以将其更改为任意值。

trans-unit.source: With PHP brackets:
trans-unit.target: 用PHP大括号。

trans-unit.source: Yes, that's right. I remove the whitespace in the HTML between the inline-block elements.
trans-unit.target: 是的,就是这样。我在HTML中删除了内嵌块元素之间的空格。

trans-unit.source: You can do this, as I usually do:
trans-unit.target: 你可以这样做,就像我平时做的那样。

trans-unit.source: You can learn more about it on this link: https://css-tricks.com/snippets/css/a-guide-to-flexbox/
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过以下链接了解更多信息： https : //css-tricks.com/snippets/css/a-guide-to-flexbox/

trans-unit.source: You can try the flexbox solution and apply the code below and the space will be remove.
trans-unit.target: 你可以尝试一下Flexbox的解决方案,应用下面的代码,空间就会被删除。

trans-unit.source: You do sometimes have to carefully consider where whitespace will come from. Will appending another element with JavaScript add whitespace? No, not if you do it properly.
trans-unit.target: 有时您确实必须仔细考虑空格的来源。 将用JavaScript附加另一个元素会添加空格吗？ 不，如果操作正确，则不会。

trans-unit.source: You will NOT have the need to go back to the css, and add another css rule, for your new inline blocks.
trans-unit.target: 你不需要再回到css,为你的新内嵌块添加另一个css规则。
